project.context.localization.common.superclasses

Class AverageMeasuresClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.context.localization.common.superclasses.CommonClass
      • project.context.localization.common.superclasses.AverageMeasuresClass

  • public class AverageMeasuresClass
extends CommonClass
    The Average measures class calculates all the measurements RSSI averages and stores them in the averages db.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateAverageMeasures

        public void calculateAverageMeasures()
        Initiates the average calculation process. This method gets called by the activities. The async task DoCalculationTask gets executed.

        protected void showCalculationProgressOutput()
        Show calculation progress output.
